Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: The tea seems to be ready to me.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: I appreciate your company, dear waiter.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Even though you service is not the best...

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: Is there any question left you wish to ask?

Choices.Choice1: Ask why the gathering was held at Eastside

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: how is being a missionary, ma'am?

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: It's a duty of honor, you could say.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Apart from my main career, I have the opportunity to spread goodwill to many.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line1: Even though I must travel extensively between East and West.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Why the gathering was also held at Eastside?

Speaker.name: Octavia_Disappoint
Speaker.line1: We want to rescue the poor lambs from such a sinister town.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: We also came to celebrate our small 'success'.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I would like to know more about your hometown, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line2: Oh, dear. I was born and raise in Eastside.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: But after tying the knot, I relocated to the West to my beloved husband.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: You must surely be tired already.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: I hope you will consider joining us,
